title: B.I.T - Bit by Bit
description: BIT - Bit by Bit is an autobiographical story of a young boy fresh from school who gets into an Engineering College where life is totally different from the protected environment of his home. He is exposed to all kinds of worldly experiences, no holds barred. This is the story of how he emerges into a mature and responsible person, groomed to take on the world, and build a career for himself. He meets a girl and falls in loveâ€¦ that transforms his life. The book is a tribute to the great institute, the Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra, Ranchi, which was the catalyst of his metamorphosis. The book has been written in a lucid and simple language and is spiced by day to day events and incidents of hostel life in a typical residential institute in India.
author: Triloki Nagpal
